name: Crashlands (itch) (Krischans Amazing Games)
description:
Crashed on a strange place with your shuttle!

You need to explore the world and find all you need to repair your shuttle.

Controlls:

Optimized for PS4 Controller or Keyboard / Mouse. In the settings you see the pre-configured one and can reconfigure it how you like.

Extra hints: Triangle = action key E, Weapon change offhand: Key 1, mainhand: Key 2.

This Demo is a full playable game and includes:

- A Main Quest and a Side Quest - More then 60 Rooms

- Different Enemies (humanoid and others)

- A 2-Handweapon and ammo-system - 3 Boss-enemies

- A map to explore - An inventory-system

- 5 Difficulty-options from very easy to impossible

- Save your game on different checkpoints

- Optimized for PS4 controller or keyboard/mouse

- Configuration for your own controller - Reconfiguration for the keyboard/mouse settings

This game is done in one month for the Metroidvania Month 14 Gamejam.

This will be the first complete Game from Krischan‘s Amazing Games.

What to expect for the final version?:

- A bigger world

- More sidequests and a increased mainquest

- Polished artwork, lighting, performance, compatibility

- A level-up-system with many extra‘s - More precise battles, a better AI

- A trophy collection

- New Game++

- And much more

For getting a final version, please support this project. Thank you very much!

I don‘t have a community or budget yet. So every support will help, including motivating comments .

Kind regards,

Your Krischan

Bugs & Features

If you find a bug, it is yours to keep. It‘s a demo, done in one month and not a final release. If you like to help me in the development-process, send a bug-request with some details to my email-account.  Important is: Where did WHAT happen and what and how it is to reproduce? 

Sometimes the player stucks,maybe get lost. You can always press "options" and restart at the last savingpoint and everything is okay again. I work on this for the next update.

If you have additional ideas, artwork, assets to help to improve this project, feel free to contact me.

Technical data and credits:

- All is developed in the Unity3D Engine 2020 LTS
